description:
Generate a modern, professional, and industrial-style landing page for a steel manufacturing company.

Business Overview:
The company specializes in manufacturing high-quality steel products for construction, infrastructure, automotive, and industrial applications. They focus on strength, durability, precision engineering, and international quality standards.

Target Audience:
- Construction companies
- Infrastructure developers
- Industrial manufacturers
- B2B buyers and exporters

Brand Tone:
Strong, reliable, industrial, professional, and trustworthy.

Design Style:
- Industrial and corporate look
- Clean layout with bold typography
- Metallic color palette (steel gray, dark blue, black, silver accents)
- Strong visual hierarchy
- Professional imagery related to steel plants, machinery, molten steel, and finished steel products

Landing Page Sections:
1. Hero Section
   - Powerful headline highlighting strength and reliability
   - Subheadline emphasizing quality, innovation, and scale
   - Call-to-action button (Get a Quote / Contact Sales)

2. About Us
   - Company background
   - Years of experience
   - Commitment to quality and safety standards

3. Products & Solutions
   - Structural steel
   - Steel sheets & coils
   - Industrial steel components
   - Custom steel fabrication

4. Why Choose Us
   - Advanced manufacturing technology
   - ISO-certified quality standards
   - On-time delivery
   - Competitive pricing
   - Skilled workforce

5. Manufacturing Process
   - Raw material sourcing
   - Production & quality checks
   - Finishing & logistics

6. Industries We Serve
   - Construction
   - Infrastructure
   - Automotive
   - Heavy machinery
   - Energy & power plants

7. Certifications & Compliance
   - ISO / Global quality certifications
   - Safety and environmental compliance

8. Testimonials / Client Trust Section
   - Trusted by leading companies
   - Long-term partnerships

9. Call to Action
   - Request quotation
   - Contact sales team

10. Footer
    - Company address
    - Phone & email
    - Social links

Technical Requirements:
- Fully responsive (desktop, tablet, mobile)
- SEO-friendly structure
- Clean, well-commented HTML & CSS
- Optimized layout for fast loading
- Accessible and professional UI

Output:
Generate production-ready HTML and CSS with modern styling suitable for a steel manufacturing company landing page.

pages.name: home
pages.purpose: Landing page for steel manufacturing company
